name: Shadow Chaser
text: The unloading was great but having to dodge railroad spikes is horrible. Be very careful it's a good place to mess up a tire.

name: Alice P.
text: Horrendous company to do business with! Changes prices on items by hundreds of dollars and doesn’t let buyers know about said changes until after they’ve charged buyers form of payment.

name: Lawrence l Black Jr.
text: I worked in maintenance/management over the Spike Division.

name: Jason Aird
text: Trucking Review. I drop off at this facility frequently. The people at the front desk are very friendly and fast. The staff that unloads you at the docks are very friendly and helpful. Ken and Dudley unload you fast and are always is good spirits. John was very helpful to the truckers, he would come out of bulldozer riding by to assist you. Definitely a great experience. Great people.

name: Ollie Barnett
text: I don't know about the old Management but they are turning things around. Great coworkers and amazing supervisors. Yeah it's dirty work but it keeps ya busy. Been working here a month and loving every second of it.

name: Heather Garner
text: Much better since a complete overhaul of management has been made

name: Ricky Berry
text: Amazing people to work for amazing work for great hours and good benefits

name: Paul Kirtland
text: Management's a joke they don't know what the jobs relate to .They definitely show favoritism . poisonous place to be in no mask nothing just unprofessional and ridiculous place to work. Management's definitely shows they was hired off the street and don't know what goin on ! I wouldn't recommend anyone work there . It's a dying company !!!

name: Meghan O'Grady
text: Appt was for 1130, checked in at 0800, docked at 0920, out by 1000. Everyone was friendly. The bathroom was clean. They do have you sign a waiver before they can unload you. I'm not sure what everyone else is delivering here that takes so long to unload. Maybe it's a freight thing. I had big bags of shredded scrap metal. The reception here is almost non-existent but, otherwise, a decent drop.

name: Chris Whitehead
text: Avoid like the plague if you are running a dry van. Absolutely not a food grade trailer on top of that. All they have are Bob Cats to unload trucks. They make you sign a damage waiver form upon entering the property, so when they mess up your equipment, there is no way to hold them liable. Truck showed up at 0800 for his appointment and we're still waiting to get unloaded as of 1412. My driver lost $2050 for a cheap load.

name: Andreja Dzamic
text: fast unloading before app

name: Florida Trucker
text: 8-16-19 my load was scheduled to be unloaded at 11am. I showed up at 7am and is being unloaded at 7.16am ....2hrs unload

name: M. SoS
text: Came in at 10am is now 230pm still not in a door,after driving all night to be on time, You shouldn't treat driver like this.

name: Cool Bean
text: dont expect quick unload , so far 5 hours still not empty

name: Z M
text: CARRIERS AVOID !!! THIS PLACE IS BAD

name: Echo Trucking
text: Bad place to delivery, still waiting for delivery 5h

name: man o m
text: terrible

name: angel millan
text:
(Translated by Google) In the office very friendly ladies, the download very fast, thank you, In the office very friendly, the download very fast, thank you

(Original)
En la oficina muy amables las señoras,la descarga bien rápida ,gracias, In the office very friendly, the download very fast, thank you

name: John J
text: Getting loaded now been treated very good by the guy that scaled me in. He told me the make all the fuel tanks for Volvo truck after seeing me driving one Said the company is amazing to work for. 30 acre facility and plenty of room to maneuver.

name: MR.CHARLES G
text: Quick and fast loading these guys dont mess around 😊😊🚛🚛

name: Shane Gallahair
text: This place you better run. Came here at twelve appointment was for two pm. Now there saying my stuff want be ready until 8or 9pm still waiting. But the young lady in office is very nice only reason they got one star. Plenty of parking if you need to sleep

name: Roger Flanders
text: Appointment time doesnt mean anything. Employees are more focused on socializing than working just like in most places in Mississippi then cry the blues when held up away from their work and too stupid to tie it together. He will show no mercy to those who are what they oppose. At dock 2 1/2 hrs after appointment and not being loaded with no one at the docks. I  anticipated this before i get the call to come to the docks. Its like lets not be obvious..... yeah to the guy who suffers from multidimensional blindness.

name: Jagdev Singh
text: Bring your food. It's been 6 hours still waiting for door

name: D Hunter
text: Not here.  It is about a half mile west on industrial parkway.
